summary: The Fair Billing Act (S. 2497) amends the Social Security Act to require off-campus outpatient departments of healthcare providers to use a separate unique health identifier and submit attestations of compliance. These departments must obtain a unique identifier and the provider must submit an initial and subsequent attestation regarding compliance with existing regulations. The Secretary of Health and Human Services is mandated to establish a process for attestation submission and review. The Inspector General of HHS must provide an analysis of the process by January 1, 2030, along with recommendations.
